title: ISurfaceRadiateFeatureData.IGetRadiatedEntities
description: Gets the radiated entities for this surface radiate feature.
returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of radiated entities of size Count VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
ISurfaceRadiateFeatureData::GetRadiatedEntitiesCount
before calling this method to get the value of Count.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details.
